titleStmt.title: An essay concerning obedience to the supreme powers, and the duty of subjects in all revolutions with some considerations touching the present juncture of affairs.
titleStmt.author: Tindal, Matthew, 1653?-1733.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Tindal. Cf. Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.).
Page 68 is stained in the filmed copy. Pages 50-end photographed from Newberry Library copy and are inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
